question_text: 在SCR催化剂上，Hg⁰的氧化可能遵循Deacon过程、Langmuir-Hinshelwood（L-H）或Eley-Rideal（E-R）等机制。具体机理取决于催化剂类型和反应条件。
standard_answer: 论文讨论了多种可能的机理："The Deacon process, where HCl is firstly oxidized by SCR catalysts to produce Cl₂ via homogeneous reaction, has been suggested to be responsible for Hg⁰ oxidation（第19页）。然而，论文也指出：'Negligible Hg⁰ can be oxidized to Hg²⁺ when Hg⁰ is added into the HCl + O₂ gas stream at the downstream of SCR catalysts（第19页）"。然而，在典型的SCR气氛下，Deacon过程受到动力学限制。相反，E-R机制更可能主导。在E-R机制中，吸附的Cl原子（来自HCl解离）与气态Hg⁰反应生成HgCl₂。但值得注意的是，Deacon过程在SCR系统中的贡献有限。而L-H机制则要求两种反应物均吸附在表面。论文进一步说明：'In the case of Langmuir-Hinshelwood mechanism, two reactants (Hg⁰ and HCl) are adsorbed on catalyst surface and react to form HgCl₂（第19页）。"这表明虽然Deacon过程在热力学上可行，但动力学上受限。因此，在SCR系统中，Hg⁰的氧化主要由非均相E-R机制控制。

original_text.1: The Deacon process, where HCl is firstly oxidized by SCR catalysts to produce Cl₂ via homogeneous reaction, has been suggested to be responsible for Hg⁰ oxidation（第19页）。
